li.label: flirtacious
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a natural when it comes to flirting with others. {PAWN_pronoun} can easily make their partners swoon over them and make them feel loved and cared for.

li.label: enchanting voice
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a voice with the power to enchant others. People listen to {PAWN_pronoun} attentively and heed to their every words. This makes it easier for {PAWN_objective} to convert others to her ideoligion or persuade prisoners to join.
